member.name: T:CompactGUI.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:CompactGUI.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:CompactGUI.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: P:CompactGUI.My.Resources.Resources.Ookii_Dialogs

member.summary: Fades the target form into or out of view
member.param: Set start opacity as a decimal between 0 and 1
Set end opacity as a decimal between 0 and 1
Set duration of transition in milliseconds
